response: narrative=Antony Mason, known for his kindness and gentle nature, went missing unexpectedly. narrative=Antony Mason, a retired broadcast engineer, was last seen leaving his home at 6-9 West Green, Crail, with an unknown intent. Reports suggest that Antony might have been experiencing symptoms related to an unknown medical condition, which could have led to disorientation. His sister, Karen Mason, informed investigators that Antony frequently visited a nearby church, which had provided him solace in the past. Concern grew when Antony's brother couldn't locate him at any familiar location. Police launched a search, eventually finding Antony safe in an alleyway near 38 Backmarch Crescent, Rosyth. It appeared that Antony, confused and disoriented, had wandered into the area and was unable to find his way back, likely exacerbated by his medical condition.
